today the mission or the privilege

language has been
building for seventy years here,
and to outline
the current state
of this science,

to complain

item.p: Scilicet “Université de Genève”, it. “Università di Ginevra”

Alessandro Chidichimo's provided each lessons date in his article appearing in Cahiers Ferdinand de Saussure. He provides the dates of the three FdS conferences at the University of Geneva: the certainty of the first two is high, comparing them with the information in the "Journal de Genève" and in "Le Genevois". Chidichimo puts forward two hypotheses for the third conference: Friday 13 November or Tuesday 17.
